name: Fly Away! (Bunk Bed Studios)
description:
3D Vertical Slice Project from Mosquitoni-Stark team. 

Instruction:

W A S D to move

Use mouse to rotate

Press F to fly

Press E to grab objects

Press Q to drop objects

Link to the survey: Playtest - Fly Away (google.com)

Team members:

Mark Victor Laguitan - Product Owner & Lead Programmer

Taninwat Kaewpankan - Scrum Master & Junior Programmer
